item.description:
Join us this Friday night for a summer evening of drinks and fun at the W Hotel Lounge!  This venue has won rave reviews and has all the style and sophistication one would expect from the W Hotel brand.  I expect a solid turnout, so come and add some spice to your summer!

The W Lounge is the perfect venue to lounge out, meet new friends, and enjoy an upscale atmosphere.  We will meet at the lounge starting at 8pm. This lounge does get VERY busy as the night progresses, so I encourage you to come EARLY. This is a great venue to start your evening - as there are many club venues nearby.  All group members are welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

W Lounge web site: http://www.starwoodhotels.com/whotels/property/dining/attraction_detail.html?propertyID=1787&attractionId=1004569644

DETAILS: We will meet at 8pm at the W Lounge (inside the W Hotel at 100 Stuart St, between Tremont St & Warrenton St, in the Theatre District).  This venue gets busy as the night rolls on, so if you can't find the group, please give me a ring (646.541.0708). Please come early!  Cover: None for W Lounge.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, call my cell: 646.541.0708. Please dress appropriately as these are upscale venues.  If traveling by T, Boylston Station is the closest for W Lounge. See you there!

Charlie

*The Organizer reserves the right to adjust RSVPs in order to balance out group turnout.*
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me at the venue - or call my cell phone.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Nightlife Style and Class at the W Hotel Lounge, Friday Night!
